effect.Name: Logical XNIMPLY (Background)
effect.description: This shader is a modification of the "AND" shader created by Cazra. The colors are bit by a logic gate XNIMPLY for base and blend colors.
effect.author: Foxioo, Cazra

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Logical XNIMPLY (Background) Shader | 1.0 (30.06.2024) */
parameter.description: This shader is a modification of the "AND" shader created by Cazra. The colors are bit by a logic gate XNIMPLY for base and blend colors.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
